items.q: Do I need a buyer's agent?
items.a: In New York, a buyer's agent protects your interests and is typically paid through the transaction structure.
From accepted offer to closing, most transactions complete in about 60-90 days.
Pre-approval is stronger because it includes full lender underwriting review.

items.q: Can I buy and sell at the same time?
items.a: Yes. We coordinate timing, contingencies, and negotiations for both sides.
